issuename: Material XXXX does not exist in plant YYYY
issuedescription: Material master record missing or not extended to plant
stepbystep: 1. Verify material number correctness. 2. Check if material is extended to plant via MM03. 3. If not extended, request extension. 4. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.
notes: Common during PO or production order creation in S/4HANA

issuename: Material XXXX is flagged for deletion
issuedescription: Material marked for deletion and hence unavailable
stepbystep: 1. Confirm deletion flag in MM03. 2. Request removal of deletion flag if needed. 3. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: Customer XXXX does not exist
issuedescription: Customer master record missing or incorrect
stepbystep: 1. Check customer number in BP. 2. Verify if customer is blocked or deleted. 3. Request creation or unblock. 4. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.
notes: Happens during order or billing in S/4HANA

issuename: Sales area XXXX not assigned to customer XXXX
issuedescription: Sales area missing in customer master
stepbystep: 1. Verify sales area assignment in BP. 2. Request addition of missing sales area. 3a. If data exist tell user to check data entry. 3b. If data doesn't exist Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: Vendor XXXX does not exist
issuedescription: Vendor master missing or inactive
stepbystep: 1. Verify vendor in BP. 2. Check if vendor is blocked or deleted. 3. Request creation or unblock. 4. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: Company code XXXX not assigned to vendor XXXX
issuedescription: Vendor not assigned to the company code
stepbystep: 1. Check vendor-company code assignment in BP. 2. Request assignment if missing. 3. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: Routing not found for material XXXX
issuedescription: Routing master data missing for production
stepbystep: 1. Check routing in CA03. 2. Request creation if missing. 3. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: Work center XXXX does not exist
issuedescription: Work center master missing or inactive
stepbystep: 1. Verify work center in CR03. 2. Request creation or activation. 3. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: Inspection plan not found for material XXXX
issuedescription: Inspection plan missing
stepbystep: 1. Check inspection plan in QA03. 2. Request creation if missing. 3. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: Quality info record not found for material XXXX and vendor YYYY
issuedescription: Missing quality info record for vendor-material combo
stepbystep: 1. Verify quality info record. 2. Request creation. 3. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: Cost center XXXX does not exist
issuedescription: Missing cost center master data
stepbystep: 1. Check cost center in KS03. 2. Request creation. 3. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: Profit center XXXX does not exist
issuedescription: Missing profit center master data
stepbystep: 1. Verify profit center in KE53. 2. Request creation. 3. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: Transportation zone XXXX does not exist
issuedescription: Missing transportation zone data
stepbystep: 1. Check zone in TM transaction. 2. Request creation. 3. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: Carrier XXXX not found
issuedescription: Carrier master missing
stepbystep: 1. Verify carrier in TM. 2. Request master data addition. 3. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: Equipment XXXX does not exist
issuedescription: Missing equipment master
stepbystep: 1. Check equipment in IE03. 2. Request creation if missing. 3. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: Functional location XXXX does not exist
issuedescription: Missing functional location master data
stepbystep: 1. Verify functional location in IL03. 2. Request creation. 3. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.

issuename: G/L account 21160000 GH50 is blocked for posting in company code XXXX
issuedescription: G/L account is blocked for posting, either at chart of accounts or CC level
stepbystep: 1. Use FS00 to check G/L account status in chart of accounts and company code. 2. Check if the account is blocked in 'Control Data' or 'Company Code Data'. 3. If needed, request unblocking via Finance master data process. 4. Assign to consultant.

issuename: G/L account XXXX is not a reconciliation account
issuedescription: Wrong type of G/L used in sub-ledger postings
stepbystep: 1. Use FS00 to check the account type. 2. For vendor/customer subledger, only reconciliation accounts are allowed. 3. Guide user to select a correct account or raise correction request.

issuename: Cost center XXXX is blocked for postings
issuedescription: Cost center is blocked in master data
stepbystep: 1. Use KS03 to view the cost center. 2. Check if it is blocked under control data. 3. If yes, raise a request to unblock or use an active cost center.

issuename: Account XXXX not defined for tax code XX in chart of accounts YYYY
issuedescription: Tax-relevant G/L account not maintained
stepbystep: 1. Use FS00 to check G/L account assignment to tax code. 2. If missing, escalate to Finance team to maintain configuration.

issuename: Posting not allowed to account type 'S' with G/L account XXXX
issuedescription: Account is not configured for cost element/cost object
stepbystep: 1. Use FS00 to verify account type and allowed postings. 2. Confirm if account is defined as cost/revenue account. 3. If not, raise request for master data adjustment.

issuename: Asset XXXX not in company code YYYY
issuedescription: Asset not created in the specified company code
stepbystep: 1. Use AS03 to check if asset exists in that company code. 2. If missing, request asset master creation. 3. Assign to Asset Accounting consultant.

issuename: Asset XXXX is blocked for posting
issuedescription: Asset is blocked in master data (e.g., status not set to capitalized)
stepbystep: 1. Use AS03 to check asset status. 2. If blocked, review asset master data fields. 3. Request unblocking if appropriate.

issuename: Profit center XXXX not found in controlling area YYYY
issuedescription: Profit center is missing or not assigned properly
stepbystep: 1. Use KE53 to verify profit center in controlling area. 2. If not found, request profit center creation or extension.

issuename: Bank key XXXX does not exist in country XX
issuedescription: Bank key not created for the relevant country
stepbystep: 1. Use FI03 to check if bank key exists. 2. If not, request new bank master creation. 3. Assign to finance master data team.

issuename: Business partner XXXX is not assigned to a customer/vendor role
issuedescription: BP exists but missing required role (e.g., vendor or customer)
stepbystep: 1. Use BP transaction to check roles. 2. Confirm if role FI Vendor / FI Customer is assigned. 3. If missing, request role assignment update.

issuename: Business partner XXXX does not have role FLVN00
issuedescription: BP created but not assigned vendor role (FLVN00)
stepbystep: 1. Use BP to check assigned roles. 2. If FLVN00 is missing, raise a request to extend BP with vendor role.

issuename: Business partner XXXX does not have role FLCU01
issuedescription: BP created but missing customer role (FLCU01)
stepbystep: 1. Use BP to check customer role assignment. 2. Request extension to role FLCU01 (Customer - FI).

issuename: Company code XXXX data missing for business partner XXXX
issuedescription: BP is not extended to the company code
stepbystep: 1. Use BP → Company Code view to verify. 2. Raise a request for BP extension to the relevant company code.

issuename: Purchasing organization XXXX data missing for BP XXXX
issuedescription: Vendor BP not extended to purchasing org
stepbystep: 1. Use BP → Purchasing Org view to verify. 2. Request extension to relevant purchasing org.

issuename: Bank details missing for vendor XXXX in company code YYYY
issuedescription: No bank maintained in BP for vendor
stepbystep: 1. Use BP → Vendor → Payment Transactions tab. 2. Add or request entry of bank details.

issuename: Material XXXX does not exist or is not activated
issuedescription: Material master record is missing or the material is created but not activated for use
stepbystep: 1. Confirm the material number is correct. 2. Use MM03 to check if the material exists. 3. If material exists but inactive, check the status in Basic Data 1 view (e.g., 'Material status' field). 4. Request activation if needed. 5. If material missing, request creation. 6. Raise a log and assign to master data consultant if unresolved.

issuename: Material XXXX is not maintained in plant YYYY
issuedescription: Material master exists but not extended to the plant
stepbystep: 1. Use MM03 to check material views. 2. Confirm plant data is missing. 3. Raise request for material extension to the plant. 4. Escalate to master data team if needed.

issuename: No BOM exists for material XXXX in plant YYYY
issuedescription: BOM not created for the material in the specified plant
stepbystep: 1. Use CS03 to check BOM. 2. If BOM missing for plant, request BOM creation for that plant.

issuename: No routing exists for material XXXX in plant YYYY
issuedescription: Routing not defined for the material at that plant
stepbystep: 1. Use CA03 to check routing. 2. Confirm plant assignment. 3. Request routing extension to the correct plant.

issuename: Material XXXX is blocked for procurement
issuedescription: Material is flagged as blocked in plant or procurement view
stepbystep: 1. Use MM03 to check procurement view. 2. Look for 'Procurement Block' field. 3. Request block removal if justified.

issuename: G/L account 21160000 GH50 is blocked for posting
issuedescription: G/L account is blocked for a specific company code or for certain posting types
stepbystep: 1. Use FS03 to check account status. 2. Review block flags (posting block, company code block). 3. Raise request to unblock the account via finance or COE team.

issuename: Vendor XXXX is blocked for posting in company code YYYY
issuedescription: Vendor is blocked from posting at the company code level
stepbystep: 1. Use BP or XK05 to verify blocking. 2. Request vendor unblock through proper workflow.

issuename: Valuation class missing for material XXXX
issuedescription: Material missing valuation class which affects posting in MM and SD
stepbystep: 1. Use MM03 → Accounting View. 2. Verify if valuation class is maintained. 3. Raise request to master data team to correct or update the valuation class.

issuename: Pricing procedure not found for sales area XXXX
issuedescription: Missing pricing procedure configuration linked to customer/material
stepbystep: 1. Verify sales area and customer master settings. 2. Escalate to SD config team to check pricing determination procedure (OVKK settings).

issuename: Account determination not possible for material XXXX
issuedescription: Material/account assignment not complete – system cannot determine G/L
stepbystep: 1. Use MM03 to verify material type/valuation class. 2. Escalate to MM/FI config team to verify OBYC settings (Automatic Account Determination).

issuename: Material XXXX does not exist in sales org
issuedescription: Material master record missing or not extended to sales org.
stepbystep: 1. Verify material number correctness. 2. Check if material is extended to plant via MM03. 3. If not extended, Raise a log and assign to master data consultant.
notes: Common during PO or production order creation in S/4HANA
